member.name: T:R5T.S0043.T000.DraftTypeMarkerAttribute
member.summary: Attribute indicating a type is a draft type (can be either an interface, or a class). The marker attribute is useful for surveying for draft types and building a catalogue of draft types as a kind of TODO list.

member.name: P:R5T.S0043.T000.DraftTypeMarkerAttribute.IsDraftType
member.summary: Allows specifying that a type is *not* a draft type. This is useful for marking types that end up canonical draft type file locations, but are not actually draft types.

member.name: T:R5T.S0043.T000.IDraftTypeMarker
member.summary: Marker interface for draft types (types that should be moved to a permanent library location, or improved). Allows methods-for, and extension methods-on, all types that are draft types.

member.name: T:R5T.S0043.Documentation
member.summary: Nazareth code element generation scripts for repositories, solutions, projects, and code files.

member.name: M:R5T.S0043.IRepositoryOperator.CreateNew_NonIdempotent(R5T.D0082.T000.GitHubRepositorySpecification,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger)
member.summary: Creates a repository and returns the local repository directory path.

member.name: M:R5T.S0043.IRepositoryOperations.CreateNew_LibraryOnlyRepository
member.summary: Library only means that no construction project is created, just the library project.

member.name: M:R5T.S0043.IRepositoryTestOperations.TryCreate_NewLibraryOnlyRepository
member.summary: Library only means that no construction project is created, just the library project.
